title: Calories in a Busch Light
meta_description: Discover calories in a Busch Light, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown for one 12 oz can, plus tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can of Busch Light beer; values based on official nutrition info.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and temperature; always check the label for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz can of Busch Light has 95 kcal and 3.2 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Busch Light can?
What are the carbs in a Busch Light?
faqs.a: About 3.2 g carbs per can, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Busch Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0.7 g protein and 0 g fat per can.

faqs.q: Is Busch Light low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, only 10 mg sodium per 12 oz can.

faqs.q: How does Busch Light compare to regular Busch?
faqs.a: Busch Light has fewer calories (95 vs. 111) and carbs due to its light formulation.
